text: Marcus Mustac Gudmann (born 27 February 2000) is a Danish footballer who plays as a centre back for Danish 1st Division club Kolding IF. ==Club career== ===FC Nordsjælland=== Gudmann came to FC Nordsjælland at the age of 11 from Ledøje-Smørum, where he had played since he was 6 years old.FCN FORLÆNGER MED GUDMANN OG ROTHMANN, fcn.dk, 9 January 2019 In January 2017, Gudmann signed a 2,5-year youth contract with Nordsjælland.LSF Dreng skriver kontrakt med FCN, lsf.dk, 9 January 2017 Gudmann's first senior experience was on 3 January 2018, where he sat on the bench for the whole game against Silkeborg IF. He got his debut for FC Nordsjælland on 11 November 2018. Gudmann started on the bench, but replaced Ulrik Yttergård Jenssen in the 60th minute in a 1-1 draw against Randers FC in the Danish Superliga. On 9 January 2019, Gudmann signed his first professional contract and would become a permanent part of the first team from the summer 2019. On the transfer deadline day, 31 January 2020, Gudmann was loaned out to Danish 1st Division club FC Roskilde for the rest of the season.FCR lejer Marcus Gudmann i FC Nordsjælland!, fc-roskilde.dk, 31 January 2020 ===Kolding IF=== On 2 October 2020, Gudmann joined Danish 1st Division club Kolding IF, signing a one-year contract.Kolding IF henter forsvarstalent i FC Nordsjælland, kif-fodbold.dk, 2 October 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Marcus Gudmann at DBU Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Danish people of Serbian descent Category:Danish Superliga players Category:Danish 1st Division players Category:Ledøje-Smørum Fodbold players Category:FC Nordsjælland players Category:FC Roskilde players Category:Kolding IF players Category:Denmark youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Marcus Gudmann
